name: UIBK software deployment framework

screenshots.caption: USIF screenshot, click for a larger view

short_description:
This software deployment framework has been used for years at the University of                   
Innsbruck (UIBK) to supply scientific computing software to our users. It has                     
been successfully applied on all of our local HPC (High Performance Computing)                    
infrastructure (LEO1-LEO3), as well as on collaborative systems, jointly                          
operated with other Universities (supercomputer MACH at the Johannes Kepler                       
University, Linz).

The framework is also in use at the Vienna Scientific Cluster 3, the largest                      
HPC system in Austria.
summary: Providing scientific computing software to HPC users.
